docs.text:
isotope-ui


HTML-configurable boolean filter UIs using 
Isotope


Requires:
- JQuery (http://jquery.com/)
- Isotope (http://isotope.metafizzy.co/)


Getting Started


Copy isotope-ui.js into your project and link it, after linking the above two libraries previously in the script load order.


Like so ~


script src=
//code.jquery.com/jquery-2.2.3.min.js
/script


script src=
//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery.isotope/2.2.2/isotope.pkgd.min.js
/script


script src=
isotope-ui.js
/script
 
!-- this is it, THIS. IS. IT. --
docs.title: Home
